rules: Use Liquid template syntax for all Shopify theme files
Follow Shopify theme best practices and section/block architecture
Ensure all components are responsive and accessible
Use CSS variables defined in snippets/css-variables.liquid
When implementing Figma designs, match the design system exactly
Always test theme changes locally before suggesting deployment
Follow the existing code style and structure in the theme
Use Shopify's schema format for section settings
Optimize images and assets for web performance
